Technical Projects

1. Design and Development of Tensile Testing Machine Mechanical

A cost-effective tensile testing machine developed using SolidWorks, Arduino, and 3D printing to analyze the stress-strain behavior of materials.

View Details

2. Design and Simulation of FDM Process Simulation

A thermal analysis of fused deposition modeling (FDM) using 316SS & AlSi10Mg to evaluate performance during additive manufacturing.

View Details

3. Analysis of 6-DOF robot trajectory planning based on workpiece orientation Mechanical

Developed a 6-DOF robotic arm using Fusion 360 and simulated joint motion in MATLAB and Blender with DH parameters, joint constraints, and velocity/position profiles.

View Details

4. Thermal performance of organic phase change material for cooling of buildings Simulation

Lauric Acid-based PCM analysis for passive building cooling.

View details

5. Analysis of Inverted Pendulum on Cart using PID Control Dynamics

Simulated the stabilization of an inverted pendulum system using PID controller in MATLAB.

View Details
